result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court with Attorney Kelsey Morin.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  This case is dismissed and read-in for Defendant's plea to Case #15CM1782
letter from Waukesha County Health and Human Services and letter from Next Level

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court with Attorney Kelsey Morin.  Michael Thurston appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morin requests one more adjournment for plea and sentence. Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 4, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court with attorney Kelsey Morin.  Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Morin requests a plea and sentencing date about 60 days out. Bail remains as fixed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 5, 2016 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court with Attorney Kelsey Morin.  David John Behm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morin requests bail modification on Defendant's case #15CM1782.  Previous court date set remains on.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert M Lanphear
Current: 1337 Sunnyridge Road  Apt #3, Pewaukee, WI 53072 United States  (Effective: 10-19-2015)
Prior: 370 E Wisconsin Ave Apt 3, Pewaukee, WI 53072

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court with Attorney Kelsey Morin.  Shawn N Woller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Morin requests an adjournment as she just received discovery.  Court adjourns.   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court.  Abbey Nickolie appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant still has not seen an attorney.  Court adjourns so Defendant can seek counsel (and public defender).   Bail remains as fixed.  Hearing scheduled for September 28, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant did not go to the public defender's office as of yet. Court advised him to go there to see if he would qualify.   NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
  Hearing scheduled for August 24, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant is not to have any violent contact with witness listed in the criminal complaint.   Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.

Defendant Robert M Lanphear in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.   Defendant to apply at Public Defender's Office for representation.  Hearing scheduled for July 20, 2015 at 08:15 am.
